issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
On Android, images in annotations views are not visible. It seems like they are ignored, but don't throw any error or warning. I did some background checks and it seems like this is a long-standing issue:
- AC-1999 
- MOD-2240
- TIMOB-12938

Both were closed as "Cannot reproduce", but for us it's definitely reproducible. Josh and Gary have access to our repo, so they will be able to reproduce it there.
fields.summary: Android - Ti.Map: Images in annotations are not rendered (works on iOS)
